name: PAWs! - Live to purr
description:
An arcade and a puzzle game mashup. It can't get any cooler than this!

PAWs! is a unique and fast-paced game that will test your reaction speed, ability to focus and flexibility, but it will also improve your decision making time.*

*It does require some skills so… no whining about that.

Website: http://playpaws.eu/

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/PlayPAWsToday

Twitter: https://twitter.com/playpawstoday
